casebody.data:
No. 10-804. Alford Jones, Petitioner v. Alvin W. Keller, Secretary, North Carolina Department of Correction, et al.; and Faye B. Brown, Petitioner v. North Carolina Department of Correction, et al. 563 U.S. 960, 131 S. Ct. 2150,

179 L. Ed. 2d 935,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3201. April 25, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the Supreme Court of North Carolina denied.

Same case below, 364 N.C. 249, 698 S.E.2d 49 (first judgment) and 364 N.C. 319, 697 S.E.2d 327 (second judgment).
